project_plan.name: Text-Based Adventure Game in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple text-based adventure game where a player can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Set up the game structure and room navigation
Implement inventory system to view collected items
Design simple challenges that the player can encounter while navigating
Write tests for room navigation, item picking, inventory viewing, and challenge encounters
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
